text:
@kimguilfoyle @JoeBiden Nothing radical about me or Joe Biden, nothing wrong with Democrats supporting their candidate, nothing wrong about American workers who choose to join a Union, parents know who cares about the health of their children against the threat of Covid19 and that would be
Joe Biden.
